meanings.definition: The state or quality of being more.
meanings.sent1: Her moreness in kindness always shines through.
meanings.sent2: The moreness of his generosity knows no bounds.
meanings.sent3: His moreness in eating cookies is legendary among his friends.
meanings.sent4: The moreness of her love enveloped everyone around her like a warm hug.
meanings.sent5: The moreness of the sun's brightness on a clear day is breathtaking.

meanings.sent1: Please add a little moreness of sugar to the recipe.
meanings.sent2: The moreness of books on the shelf made it hard to find the one she wanted.
meanings.sent3: The moreness of toppings on his pizza made it almost too heavy to carry.
meanings.sent4: The moreness of stars in the night sky was like a sprinkle of diamonds.
meanings.sent5: The moreness of laughter in the room filled her heart with joy.

meanings.sent1: His moreness of energy compared to his siblings was noticeable.
meanings.sent2: The moreness of rain this year has made the flowers bloom beautifully.
meanings.sent3: The moreness of noise in the city can be overwhelming at times.
meanings.sent4: The moreness of colors in the painting brought it to life.
meanings.sent5: The moreness of joy in her smile was contagious to everyone around her.
